messages.title: Action to help with cost of living
messages.content: Stagnant wages. Rising inequality. Sluggish economic growth.

messages.content: Standing proudly at the front of the stop Brexit movement.

messages.title: Action on our NHS
messages.content: The current funding crisis in the NHS and Social Care is keeping all too many people up at night.
